reviewText: didn't help much - we hired this guy as guide and he had no hospitality instincts -- it rained -- equipment substandard -- and a long way out there.

excellent You will not regret it is beautifully filmed  & the interviews are fantastic and you will get a very very good idea about Navajo life and home life and following the seasons of the year in a loving home
i just love this tape so much it is great i just love to watch it thank you so much

While living on the Navajo Reservation for many years, this was THE film I showed visitors to learn about Navajo language, people, and way of life. This is an excellent picture of the beauty and life in Navajo country and needs to be on DVD!
I saw this twice on PBS and still wanted to buy the DVD. The editorial review will describe it for you, I will just tell you I get a peaceful feeling watching this.
